00010 try:
00011     True, False
00012 except NameError:
00013     # Maintain compatibility with Python 2.2
00014     True, False = 1, 0
00015         
00016 class adodb_mxoracle(adodb_mxodbc.adodb_mxodbc):
00017     databaseType = 'mxoracle'
00018     dataProvider = 'mxodbc'
00019     sysDate = 'trunc(SysDate)'
00020     sysTimeStamp = 'SysDate'
00021     replaceQuote = "''"
00022     
00023     def _newcursor(self,rs):
00024         return cursor_mxoracle(rs,self)
00025 
00026     # offset not supported
00027     def SelectLimit(self,sql,limit,offset=-1,params=None):
00028         if offset == -1:
00029             return self.Execute("select * from ("+sql+") where rownum <= "+str(limit), params)
00030         else:
00031             raise StandardError, "SelectLimit does not support offset: " + sql
00032 
00033     def DBDate(self,d):
00034         if d == None: return 'null'
00035         return "TO_DATE(%s,'%s')" % (d.strftime(self.fmtDate),self.NLS_DATE_FORMAT)
00036 
00037     def DBTimeStamp(self,d):
00038         if d == None: return 'null'
00039         return "TO_DATE(%s,'%s')" % (d.strftime(self.fmtTimeStamp),self.NLS_DATE_FORMAT)
00040     
00041         
00042 class cursor_mxoracle(adodb_mxodbc.cursor_mxodbc):
00043     def __init__(self,rs,conn):
00044         adodb_mxodbc.cursor_mxodbc.__init__(self,rs,conn)
00045 
00046 if __name__ == '__main__':
00047     db = adodb_mxoracle()
00048     db.Connect('sherkhan','scott','natsoft') #"dsn=sherkhan;uid=scott;pwd=natsoft")
00049     adodb.Test(db)
